mapper.select: SELECT g.id as id, goods_sn, g.name as name, category_id, brand_id, brief, spec_list, pic_url, unit, g.state as state, g.add_time as add_time, g.update_time as update_time, modi_user, p.id as product_id, product_sn, p.name as product_name, original_price, stock, weight, p.add_time as product_add_time, p.update_time as product_update_time, p.state as product_state FROM oomall_goods g LEFT JOIN oomall_product p ON g.id = p.goods_id WHERE g.state != 2 and g.id = #{id} and goods_sn = #{goodsSn} and g.name = #{name} and category_id = #{categoryId} and brand_id = #{brandId} and g.state = #{state}

SELECT id, goods_id, product_sn, name, original_price, stock, weight, add_time, update_time, state FROM oomall_product WHERE state != 2 AND p.id = #{id} AND product_sn = #{productSn} AND goods_id = #{goodsId} AND state = #{state}
SELECT id, price, quantity, begin_time, end_time FROM oomall_price_stock WHERE product_id =#{id} AND end_time >= now() AND begin_time <= now()
